accessibility.text: Income Pyramid
High Incomes
Does inflation affect 100% of the population ?
Lose during inflationary periods: Inflation erodes their real returns and they are unfairly taxed
Gain during inflationary periods: Borrowers pay less in real terms and most wages are protected from inflation by their labor contract
Low Incomes
Income Pyramid
High Incomes
Does inflation affect 100% of the population ?
Lose during inflationary periods: Inflation erodes their real returns and they are unfairly taxed
Gain during inflationary periods: Borrowers pay less in real terms and most wages are protected from inflation by their labor contract
Low Incomes
Borrowers/those whose incomes come mostly from Wages

Lose during inflationary periods: Inflation erodes their real returns and they are unfairly taxed
Gain during inflationary periods: Borrowers pay less in real terms and most wages are protected from inflation by their labor contract
Low Incomes
